sources.title: Dr. Renault's Secret (1942)
sources.description: J. Carroll Naish, Shepperd Strudwick, Lynne Roberts, George Zucco, Mike Mazurki Directed by Harry Lachman Music by David Raksin

metadata.Plot: A young man visits his fianc√©e in a remote French villa where her scientist father resides. There he meets Noel, Dr. Renault's mysterious assistant, who has a strange attraction to Renault's daughter. Soon he learns Noel's true identity: he is an ape that was turned into a man by Renault's bizarre experiments!
metadata.Writer: William Bruckner, Robert F. Metzler, Gaston Leroux
metadata.Actors: J. Carrol Naish, Shepperd Strudwick, Lynne Roberts
